summary: Provides a ready-to-use pipeline that orchestrates the Stable Diffusion XL model with Prompt Attention Guidance (PAG) for text‑to‑image generation, handling model initialization, configuration loading, and pretrained weight retrieval.
business_intent: Allow developers to quickly integrate state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑image generation capabilities into applications by offering a configurable, high‑performance diffusion pipeline.
